titles.title: Charitable Giving Tax Relief Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow nonitemizers a deduction for a portion of their charitable contributions.
Charitable Giving Tax Relief Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Charitable Giving Tax Relief Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit non-itemizers to deduct a portion of their charitable contributions.
